channel.title: Alchemist "Overhaul."
channel.description: >**Alchemist - Neutral Special** Passive(1): Coagulate, Immune to bleeding Passive(2): Potion brew, You cannot use the same potion three times in a row. Day Ability(1): Stone skin, Make yourself Immune tonight (3 Uses). Day Ability(2): Emerald Potion, Poison a player using your night action will kill them (Healing, will attack them bypassing healing, Occupying will occupy and kill them). (2 Uses). Night Ability(1): Crimson Potion, Heal a player from attacks tonight, also Cures bleeding and butler posion. (Infinite) Night Ability(2): Tar Potion, Occupy a player making them unable to take any actions, You'll gain Occupy Immunity while using this. (Infinite) Goal: Survive.

item.title: Alchemist "Overhaul."

Night Ability(1): Crimson Potion, Heal a player from attacks tonight, also Cures bleeding and butler posion. (Infinite)
Night Ability(2): Tar Potion, Occupy a player making them unable to take any actions, Youâ€™ll gain Occupy Immunity while using this. (Infinite)
